title: How should I introduce myself in my new YouTube Show? - Quora

response.answer_text: Be as real as you can. Be yourself.  Every great introduction starts with a story. Tell a little bit of your background. What have you been doing in your life? What led you to create this channel. What’s so unique about you that thousands other Youtube creators doesn’t have? Communicate your USP (Unique Selling Proposition). Discuss about what value you and your channel are going to add in people’s live. Remember, just be happy, positive, energetic and enthusiastic. I would suggest to do these things before uploading your introduction video: Write a proper script about your introductionRecord itWatch it as a viewer and pick out pros and consEdit. Edit. EditIf not satisfied, do it all over againOh, and one more thing; use a good camera and keep the sound quality smooth. Nobody wants to see a jittery video with your voice sounding as if you’re speaking from inside of a cave.

Since it’s a new show, I would suggest to keep you introduction as short as possible. The reason being, they don’t know you, and they probably don’t want to, they’re here because of your content. So a simple, “Hey guys, welcome to SHOW NAME, I’m your host NAME.” Then get into the content from there.
